meanings.definition: The quality or state of being immiscible.
meanings.sent1: The immiscibilities of oil and water are well-known.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the immiscibilities of different liquids.
meanings.sent3: The immiscibilities of the paint colors made the artist's palette a mess.
meanings.sent4: The immiscibilities between the two groups led to a heated argument.
meanings.sent5: The immiscibilities of the ingredients in the recipe caused it to fail.

meanings.definition: Lack of ability to mix or blend.
meanings.sent1: The immiscibilities of the ingredients resulted in a lumpy batter.
meanings.sent2: The immiscibilities in the chemical reaction caused an unexpected outcome.
meanings.sent3: The immiscibilities of the puzzle pieces made it impossible to complete.
meanings.sent4: The immiscibilities between the two teams created tension on the field.
meanings.sent5: The immiscibilities of the colors in the painting gave it a unique texture.
